Share.

Wireless presenting with one click

Getting connected In remote and collaborative meetings can be a hassle. No more cables, unfindable passwords and bad connections. Simply share a presentation on your laptop or mobile device, to a presentation screen with a single click with our wireless presenting solutions.

Take control.

Manage your device fleet

A comprehensive cloud solution to take away all your display management needs, enter i3RDM. Push applications to your displays, set policies, tweak settings and manage in a remote session. Get rid of all the nasty logistics and get started with this incredible timesaver.
